mapper.insert: insert into artwork (awtitle, userid, awcont, fnames, fsizes, uuid, shoetype, shoecost, shippingfee, custperiod) values (#{awtitle}, #{userid}, #{awcont}, #{fnames}, #{fsizes}, #{uuid}, #{shoetype}, #{shoecost}, #{shippingfee}, #{custperiod})
mapper.select: select awno, awtitle, userid , awcont, awregd, awviews, awthumbup, fnames, uuid from artwork order by awno desc limit #{snum}, 12

select awno, awtitle, userid, awregd, awviews, awthumbup from artwork where ${ftype} like concat(#{fkey}, '%') where awtitle like concat(#{fkey}, '%') or awcont like concat(#{fkey}, '%') order by awno desc limit #{snum}, 12
select count(awno) cnt from artwork where ${ftype} like concat(#{fkey}, '%') where awtitle like concat(#{fkey}, '%') or awcont like concat(#{fkey}, '%')
mapper.update: update artwork set awviews = awviews + 1 where awno = #{awno}
update artwork set awthumbup = awthumbup + 1 where awno = #{awno}
mapper.select: select * from (select awno, lead(awno) over (order by awno desc) prev from artwork) newone where awno = #{awno}
select * from (select awno, lag(awno) over (order by awno desc) next from artwork) newone where awno = #{awno}
mapper.insert: insert into meeting (mtitle, userid, uemail, mtcont) values (#{mtitle}, #{userid}, #{uemail}, #{mtcont})
mapper.select: select fnames from artwork where awno = #{awno}
select fsizes from artwork where awno = #{awno}
select AUTO_INCREMENT - 1 awno from information_schema.TABLES where TABLE_NAME = 'artwork'
